title: (x) Daily Mail typeface / blackletter newspaper nameplate - custom, various alternatives {Florian}
content:
Does anyone know what it is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623033307im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-4_3839.gif)
author: umily

comments.content:
Hi Emily,

newspaper nameplates are almost always custom designed.  
If you’re looking for similar typefaces, check out  
 [Avebury](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623033307/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/parkinson_type_design/avebury/?&sample_text=Daily%20Mail&sample_size=60)  
 [Gotisch Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623033307/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsnerflake/gotisch_bold_ot/?&sample_text=Daily%20Mail&sample_size=96)  
 [Fette Schwabacher groß](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623033307/http:/www.romana-hamburg.de/fraktur7.htm)  
See also [this older thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623033307/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50003).

F
Thanks very much Florian, very helpful
